channel.title: Fixes on Maksim Tsiarokhin
channel.description: Recent content in Fixes on Maksim Tsiarokhin

item.title: Fix electronic reporting in D365FO dev boxes
item.description:
Update 15 February 2026 Link to heading

Microsoft dropped ER Dataverse repository support completely, use File System repository with a local download from LCS as described here

Original article Link to heading

Starting November 15, 2023, Microsoft stopped installing S2S certificates to newly deployed cloud development environments. As a result, all functions that required integration with Microsoft Entra (Azure AD) no longer work out of the box. The link above contains a solution to bring back the ability to import users, but does not solve the error of importing Electronic reporting (ER) configurations:

item.title: D365FO business events error
item.description:
Problem Link to heading

Starting February 2020 a strange thing happened on our D365: all business events connected to Microsoft Flow suddenly stopped working. Under the errors tab in business events workspace, it shows this exception: The underlying connection was closed: An unexpected error occurred on a send.

Doing some research hasn’t helped much - all I got is this exception message is somehow related to security protocols and TLS 1.2.
